summary: 查询工作空间下特定应用详情。

Content.title: wdl内容
Content.example: task echo {   String txt_out = "default_txt_out"   String dd_out = "default_dd_out"    command {     echo Hello > ${txt_out}     /bin/bash -c "dd if=/dev/zero of=${dd_out} bs=1M count=15"     echo "This is a test std out."   }    runtime {     cpu: "2"     memory: "4G"     autoReleaseJob: false     reserveOnFail: true     userData: "key1 value1"     disks: "local-disk 40 cloud_ssd, /home/mount/ 40 cloud_efficiency"     tag: "TestTag"   }    output {     File outTxtFile = "${txt_out}"     File outDdFile = "${dd_out}"   } }

400.errorMessage: The input parameter %s that is mandatory for processing this request is not supplied.

404.errorMessage: The specified resource %s is not found.
The specified user is not found.

title: 查询应用详情
